#**Introduction**
Our medicare spending data comes from this link: 
https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/medicare-hospital-spending-per-patient-hospital-da578

We wanted to focus on how medicare spending for claim types changes based on the partisanship of a state. We also wanted to look at how spending changed based on how much the state spends per capita on medicare so we created a KPI medicare spending per capita that divides the average spending on a claim type by how much the state spends on medicare per capita.
